ma lta bur 'gyur ro/ /de'i sras ni sgra rnam par grags pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ /da ltar nga'i gzhon nu sgra gcan 'dzin lta bur 'gyur ro/ /de'i btsun mo dam pa ni blo gros chen po zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ da ltar nga'i shAkya'i bu mo sa

'tsho ma lta bur 'gyur ro/ /de'i ma ma ni grags pa chen po zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ da ltar nga'i skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI lta bur 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das de'i rim gro pa ni rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ da ltar

nga'i rim gro pa 'dun pa lta bur 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i blo gros kyi tog gi rgyal po de gang la bcibs te/ mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rta'i rgyal po de ni shugs can ldan zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ da ltar nga'i rta'i

rgyal po mngags ldan lta bur 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das de'i byang chub kyi snying po ni chos kyis 'phags pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ der de bzhin gshegs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par

'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi snying po de ni byang chub kyi shing 'bum phrag brgyad cus yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal de'i tshe de'i dus na bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur te 'jam dpal

gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i blo gros kyi tog gi rgyal po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can gyi ris gang ji

snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad me tog dang phreng ba dang / spos dang / phye ma dang / byug pa dang / sil snyan dang / pheg thogs shing byang chub kyi snying po chos kyis 'phags pa ga la ba der dong ste/ glu dang rol mo sna tshogs byed

par 'gyur ro/ /'og min ris kyi mthar thug pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad kyang der 'du bar 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs phal po che 'ang der 'du bar 'gyur ro/ /

shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dag nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs shin du mang ba 'du bar 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i blo gros kyi tog gi rgyal po de thog ma mngon par rdzogs

par sangs rgyas nas 'dus pa'i 'khor du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul gyi thabs kyi yul la rnam par 'phrul ba bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs chen po mdo sde bye ba 'bum phrag du ma'i 'khor dang ldan pa ston par 'gyur te/ 'jam

dpal de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i blo gros kyi tog gi rgyal po des chos kyi rnam grangs de bstan pa'i tshe sems can gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal

de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i blo gros kyi tog gi rgyal po des chos ston pa ni theg pa gsum rnam par dgod pas mi ston te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa dag 'byung bar mi

'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad kyang theg pa gcig la mos pa rgya chen po la mos pa sha stag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i blo gros kyi tog gi rgyal po de'i 'dus pa

dang po ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'gyur ro/ /'dus pa gnyis pa ni byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa khrag khrig phrag brgyad bcur 'gyur ro/ /'dus pa

gsum pa ni byang chub sems dpa' dkrigs phrag drug bcur 'gyur te/ de phyin cad sems can grangs dang bgrang ba las 'das pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la 'god par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal

de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i blo gros kyi tog gi rgyal po de byang chub thob pa'i tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa drug bcur 'gyur ro/ /de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang lo bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad bcur dam pa'i chos gnas par

'gyur ro/ /dam pa'i chos rgyas pas sems can de snyed 'dul bar 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa de gang gi tshe yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' tog chen po zhes bya ba 'di nga'i 'og tu bla na

med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de bkod pa chen po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes byang chub sems dpa' tog chen

po zhes bya ba lung bstan nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i tshe thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' tog chen po zhes bya ba 'byung zhing / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa

bden pa'i blo gros kyi tog gi rgyal po de'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bkod pa chen po

zhes bya bar 'gyur ba de gang zhig yin snyam du ya mtshan du 'dzin par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de'i sems kyi rnam par rtog pa thugs kyis thugs su chud nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur

gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu bden smra 'di'i mdun du bram ze'i khye'u bden dga' zhes bya ba 'dug pa bram ze'i byis pa thams cad kyi nang na mchog tu bya ba 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bkod pa chen po zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i blo gros kyi tog gi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /

sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa'i che ba de thos nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de las byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug bcus sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam btab ste/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan

'das de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i blo gros kyi tog gi rgyal po de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa de'i tshe bdag cag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams der skye bar shog shig ces

smon lam btab par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar lung bstan to/ /de nas gcer bu pa 'bum phrag brgyad bcu po de dag gis kyang tshig 'thun par smras pa/ bcom ldan

'das bdag cag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar lung bstan to/ /de nas steng gi bar snang las kyang lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig

'bum phrag dgu bcus 'di skad kyi tshig brjod de/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa'i blo gros kyi tog gi rgyal po de byang chub brnyes pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams shin du rnam

par bltas pa'i grags pa can der skye bar gyur cig /yon tan bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de yang mthong bar shog shig ces smon lam btab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag khyed cag kyang 'jig

rten gyi khams shin du rnam par bltas pa'i grags pa can der skye bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de yang mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bu khyed kyang 'jig rten gyi khams shin du rnam par bltas pa'i grags pa can de nyid du bla na med pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ ming tha dad pa'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur la tshe'i tshad ni 'thun par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa

drug tu g.yos te/ sa'i 'og nas pad ma 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi mdab ma can nor bu rin po che chen po an da rnyil gyi ze ba'i tshogs can/ spug gi snying po dang ldan pa/ nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya'i chu ba can/ bye ba khrag khrig

'bum phrag du ma dag gis sa gzhi brtol nas mngon par 'phags te/ pad ma de dag thams cad la byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs skyil mo krung du 'khod pa mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos legs par brgyan pa'i lus kyis bcom ldan

'das la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal bar snang bar gyur te/ de dag gis rin po che sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi dra ba dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab nas 'di skad kyi tshig brjod do/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni 'jig rten

gzhan dang gzhan gyi khams nas de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa bka' stsal pa 'di 'ang nyan/ bcom ldan 'das la yang blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba

dang / rigs kyi bu bden smra 'di dang 'khor 'dus pa 'di yang blta ba'i slad du 'dir mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag tu byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba

las 'das pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe don 'di nyid shin du gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /

rtse gcig sems su dbang po mnyam zhog ste/ /de ring ngas smras 'di don mnyan par gyis/ /de bzhin gshegs la brdzun gyi tshig mi mnga'/ /bde gshegs rang byung tshig ni gzhan du min/ /skye bo de dga' bden smra 'di nyid ni/ /

dag cing dri med gnod med bskal pa la/ /bskal pa grangs med mang pos 'jig rten du/ /'tshang rgya bden pa'i blo gros tog gi rgyal/ /nyon mongs gnod pa de la mi 'byung ste/ /de phyir bskal pa de ni gnod med pa/ /'jig rten ming yang

rnam par bltas pa ste/ /bskal pa de ni dpal gyi phung por 'gyur/ /rnam par 'dren pa de yi bskal pa de/ /lha mi rnams kyis blta ba'i 'os 'gyur te/ /rin chen tshogs kyi 'obs dang rta babs rnams/ /nyams dga' kun nas

shin du mdzes par 'gyur/ /'dzam bu klung gi gser gyi dra bas g.yogs/ /chos kyi sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba bsgrags/ /seng ge'i rgyal mtshan rab rnams rtag tu bsgreng / /rin chen tshogs kyi lda ldi brgya dag spyangs/ /

rtsig pa'i rgyud ni rin chen dri med de/ /de ni lha yi khyim dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /mtshe'u dang lu ma pad ma'i mtsho dag gis/ /de ni rtag tu legs par brgyan par 'gyur/ /de yi chu dang pad ma ud pal dang / /pad ma dkar po dag gis

kun khebs 'gyur/ /gling bzhi pa yi 'jig rten bar ma de/ /ming ni blta na sdug cing yid 'ong ste/ /de ni bde gshegs de yi skye ba yis/ /rang byung de ni bram ze'i rigs las 'byung / /thub pa'i yum ni shugs dang
ldan zhes bya/ /yab ni tshangs pa'i dbyig ces bya bar 'gyur/ /de yi bu ni rnam grags sgra zhes bya/ /dper na nga'i bu sgra gcan zin 'di 'dra/ /bde gshegs de yi btsun mo dam pa ni/ /blo gros chen mo

nga yi sa 'tsho bzhin/ /de yi ma ma ming ni grags chen te/ /nga yi skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo bzhin/ /thub pa'i rim gro byed pa'i sems can 'phags/ /rtag tu rjes su 'brang zhes bya ba ste/ /nga yi rim gro 'dun pa gus

ldan bzhin/ /de ni 'dren pa de la rim gro byed/ /thub pa de yi rta mchog 'gyur ba yi/ /shugs can zhes bya'i ming dang ldan 'gyur te/ /bde gshegs mngon par 'byung tshe bcibs par 'gyur/ /nga yi rta mchog bsngags ldan

gyur pa bzhin/ /bde gshegs de yi rdzogs pa'i byang chub shing / /chos kyi 'phags shes bya ba de tshe 'byung / /shing mchog brgya phrag stong du bsgyur ba yin/ /phrag ni brgyad cu dag gis de bskor 'gyur/ /shing mchog de drung

kye ma chos kyi rgyal/ /rang byung zla med bden zhes bya bzhugs nas/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub rab zhi ba/ /mya ngan med pa mngon par 'tshang rgyar 'gyur/ /de na bdud med bdud kyi phyogs kyang med/ /bdud kyi las kyang der

'byung mi 'gyur ro/ /rgyal ba thub pa gang zag zla med pa'i/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni gnod bdo med par 'gyur/ /mi dang lha tshogs mang po 'du 'gyur te/ /rnam dag shin du sbyangs pa de tshe 'byung / /de kun me tog phreng

ba gos dang glu/ /rol mo sgra yis bde gshegs drung 'dong 'gyur/ /rgyal bas de dag bsam mkhyen mdo sde 'di/ /mdo gzhan lhan cig drang srong gsung bar 'gyur/ /rgyal ba des ni rab tu gsungs pa yi/ /mdo sde
khyad par 'phags pa 'di thos nas/ /sems can dpag yas gang gA'i bye ma snyed/ /thub dbang byang chub mchog tu mi ldog 'gyur/ /theg pa dman pa der 'byung mi 'gyur te/ /rang rgyal theg pa'ang zhing der

'byung mi 'gyur/ /rgyal ba de yi sangs rgyas zhing mchog der/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'byung kun dpa' zhing 'dzangs/ /rkang gnyis mchog de'i 'dus pa dang por ni/ /rgyal sras grags pa'i 'od ldan gang 'byung ba/ /

rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog /rnam dag gang gA'i rdul bas mang ba 'byung / /blo bzang ldan pa'i 'dus pa gnyis pa ni/ /skye ba gcig gnas khrag khrig brgyad cu 'byung / /'dus pa gsum pa byang chub sems

dpa' mchog /dkrigs phrag drug bcu dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad 'gyur ba/ /bskal pa bar ma drug bcu tshang ba ste/ /rgyal ba de ni mya ngan 'das gyur nas/ /mi yi 'dren pa'i chos

kyi sgron ma yang / /lo grangs bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag ni/ /brgyad bcu tham par gnas par 'gyur ba yin/ /rang gi sku gdung ring bsrel rgyas mdzad cing / /de ni gdul ba rab mang 'dul bar 'gyur/ /drang srong che de byang chub

sems dpa' ni/ /tog chen lung bstan mdzad nas mya ngan 'da'/ /'di ni bkod chen zhes bya'i thub dbang 'gyur/ /rgyal ba dgra las rgyal bar 'di 'gyur ro/ /rgyal ba de yi zhing bkod 'di 'dra ste/ /'jig rten phan par

mdzad pa 'di bzhin no/ /rgyal ba'i byang chub mnyam med dri med pa/ /rab zhi rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mgon por 'gyur/ /nga yi mkhyen pa de 'dra nam mkha'i tshad/ /bskal pa 'byung ba mang po rab tu shes/ /'das pa los

shes da ltar ci zhig sems/ /ye shes kun du thogs pa med pa mnga'/ /nga yi tshig ni dag cing brdzun med de/ /brdzun du mi smra don dam bden pa la/ /nga gnas nas ni nam yang mi smra'o/ /ji skad gsungs pa 'di la yid ches

gyis/ /drang srong chen po'i gsung 'di thos gyur nas/ /'khor rnams kun kyang dga' ba'i sems gyur te/ /de tshe khams der skye bar shog shig ces/ /zhing mchog der skyer dad pas smon lam btab/ /'jig rten

khams mchog der ni skye 'gyur te/ /'jig rten 'dren pas de dag lung bstan te/ /der ni khyed kyis bde gshegs thob gyur nas/ /kun kyang sems can don mang byed par 'gyur/ /mdo sde rgyal po 'di bstan de yi tshe/ /

sa chen 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ /byang chub sems dpa' pad mar gnas pa dag /de tshe thal sbyar thub la 'di skad gsol/ /khyod kyis chos tshul dam pa 'di gsungs pa/ /thub pa zla med rang bzhin shin du legs/ /

chos kyi tshul rab dam pa mnyan pa dang / /rgyal ba'i chos 'tshal bdag cag 'dir mchis lags/ /de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de tshim zhing mgu ste/ yi rangs la rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde

ba skyes nas gos re re bzhag ste/ /gos gzhan dag bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol nas tshig 'di skad kyang smras te/ kye ma 'jig rten du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba gnyis pa byung bar gyur te/ dang po ni grong khyer ba

ra na ser bskor to/ /chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis de ring 'dir bskor to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi chad par chos rin po che 'di dang mi 'bral zhing skyes bu dam pa 'di dang mi

'bral bar shog shig ces smon lam btab bo/ /steng gi bar snang las kyang lha'i rnga chen po dag sgra mngon par 'byin par gyur to/ /lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar po'i char chen po yang

bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung du mngon par bab par gyur to/ /steng gi bar snang la yang lha rnams kyis lha'i gos dag g.yab mo thabs su bskor te/ /tshig 'di skad kyang brjod par gyur to/ /skyes bu dam pa gang dag chos

kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa de dag ni yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'o/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces

gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa dang / glegs bam
du bgyis shing 'chang ba na bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed cig 'phel bar 'gyur lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /
'jam dpal gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can gzugs can nam/ gzugs can ma yin pa 'am/ 'du shes can nam

'du shes can ma yin pa ji snyed pa dang sems can gyi khams na sems can ji snyed cig yod par sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis mkhyen pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub

mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur la de dag thams cad la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis bskal par gnas pa'i tshe bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gro byas/ bla mar byas/ sti stang du
byas/ mchod pa byas na/ 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams mang du skyed dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa mang
lags te/ 'di ltar bgrang ba 'am/ brtsi bar yang sla ba ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bas kyang gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ gzhan

dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston tam/ glegs bam du bris te 'chang ngam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par bstan na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lung 'bog pa de bsod nams mang du skyed do/ /de skad ces
bka' stsal pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten thams cad la sman pa'i slad du chos kyi rnam
grangs 'di bstan pa ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring po ji srid cig tu 'dzam bu'i gling na mchis par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

'jam dpal nga mya ngan las 'das nas gang gi tshe rgyal po brgyad kyis nga'i ring bsrel rgya cher bya ba'i phyir brgyad du bgos nas za ma tog brgyad du bcug ste/ rang rang gi yul du mchod rten gyi khang pa yangs par 'jog par 'gyur te/

rgyal po ma skyes dgras ni nga'i ring bsrel rnams las brgyad cha blangs nas rin po che'i za ma tog tu bcug ste/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i phyi rol du sa brkos nas ring bsrel la pog snod kha gab bcad nas spos kyis ni bdugs/

gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ni btsugs/ rin po che'i me tog ni gtor/ lo brgyar byin gyis brlabs pa'i mar me me lce gcig tu 'bar ba ni bus shing ring bsrel gyi za ma tog 'jog par 'gyur la/ rgyal po mya ngan med pa 'byung bar 'gyur

ba bsdad pa'i phyir mdo'i rgyal po 'di gser gyi glegs bam la bris nas ring bsrel gyi za ma tog de nyid du 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ rgyal po mya ngan med pa de ni mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya lon pa na

'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ni mo'u r+ya'i rigs su skyes pa/ 'dzam bu'i gling la dbang ba/ mthu dang brtson pa thob pa/ stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te/ de nga'i rnam pa las rjes su dran par byed par 'gyur ro/ /nga'i

bstan pa la yang dad pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong dbang po bde ba zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul che ba/ mthu che ba/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa/ shin du rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'dzin pa/ rgyal po'i rigs

las rab tu byung ba/ rgyal po mya ngan med pas bkur ba grong du 'jug pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal de ltar rgyal po mya ngan med pa des nga'i ring bsrel rgya cher bya ba'i phyir skye bo mang pos yongs su bskor cing bkod

pa chen po dang rgyal po'i mthu chen pos me tog phreng ba dang / spos dang / phye ma dang / byug pa dang / sil snyan dang / pheg thogs te rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por song nas mchod pa'i cho ga mngon par 'du bya ba chen po byas

te sa'i phyogs de nas ring bsrel gyi za ma tog de phyung nas/ nyi ma bdun gyi bar du spos thams cad dang / me tog thams cad dang / me tog phreng thams cad dang / phye ma thams cad dang / byug pa thams cad dang /

sil snyan thams cad dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs thams cad kyis mchod pa rnam pa du ma byas te/ skar ma dang / sbyor ba dang ldan pa gcig la yul sna tshogs su chos kyi rgyal pos byas pa'i mchod rten brgyad khri bzhi stong

byed par 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe chos smra ba dbang po bde bas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ring bsrel gyi za ma tog nas phyung nas byang phyogs kyi rgyud kyi yul chen por 'jog par 'gyur te/ skye bo mang pos shes par mi 'gyur/

skye bo mang pos rig par mi 'gyur/ skye bo mang pos yongs su bzung bar mi 'gyur la chos kyi rnam grangs 'dzin pa nyung ba dang / klog pa nyung bar 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni rtag tu sgrom du bcug pa dang

snod du bcug par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos tshol ba med cing snod ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni mos par dka' zhing yid ches par dka' la/ rtogs par dka' ba ste/ mun

sprul du mngon par yid ches pa 'am/ 'jug par mi nus so/ /'jam dpal phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe lnga brgya pa tha ma la bab pa'i tshe chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang la la dag gis thos te/ yid ches par gyur tam/ tshol lam rtog

na de dag ni 'jam dpal khyod kyis sangs rgyas mang po la snyen bkur byas pa/ legs par spyod pa spyad pa/ theg pa chen po 'di'i snod du gyur par nges par rig par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos kyi rnam

grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / glegs bam du byas shing 'chang ba de dag thams cad kyis kyang bdag cag gis ni sngon de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag mthong

bar gyur to/ /mnyes par byas so/ /bsnyen bkur byas so zhes bya ba dang / de dag gis ni nga yang bskyed mos tshal 'di na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa dang / 'khor 'dus pa 'di yang mthong ngo zhes de ltar shes par bya'o/ /de'i tshe bcom

ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di long shig /zung shig /kun chub par gyis shig /dbang po rnon po rnams ma gtogs par gar bab bab kyi bdun du ma ston

cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na kun dga' bo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba yin pa dang / 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang chen yin pa dang / 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar chad med pa'i chos bstan pa yin pa dang / 'di ni de bzhin

gshegs pa'i phyag rgya yin pa dang / 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsrung ba bsgom pa yin pa dang / 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gter gyi mchog yin pa'i phyir te/ kun dga' bo de bas na nga'i bu thu bo chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pa/ chos

kyi mdzod srung ba de dag la sbyin par bya ba ma gtogs par 'di ni shin du sba bar bya zhing su la'ang sbyin par mi bya'o/ /kun dga' bos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung lags na/ bcom ldan 'das

chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar bzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul gyi thabs kyi yul la

rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa zhes bya bar zung shig /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i gnas shes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar med pa'i chos bstan pa zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul zhes

bya ba dang / theg pa gcig tu bstan pa zhes bya ba dang / 'jam dpal gyis yongs su dris pa zhes bya ba dang / bden smra lung bstan pa zhes bya ba dang / bden smra'i le'u zhes bya bar yang zung shig /chos kyi rnam

grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe srog chags khrag khrig phrag sum bcu sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma skyes pa las sems skyes par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' drug khris ni mi skye ba'i chos

la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /sems can tshad med pa dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang 'jam

dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang /

'jig rten skyong ba rnams dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o/ /

'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul gyi thabs kyi yul la rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sde
la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ lan gnyis zhus/ phyis shin tu dag par skar mas zhus shing bar du ma dag pa mang po bcos 'dug pa da bcos par bzhag go/ /

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ta thA ga ta ma hA ka ru NA ni ra de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po nges par bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/
sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri sngon rgyal ba bzhugs bzhugs pa'i

mchod rten chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin kyis brlabs kyis brlabs pa sa'i snying po/ byang chub sems dpas mngon par bstod pa/ chos kyi gdan lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin gyis phyag

byas pa'i sa phyogs/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par skul ba de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba chos kyi sgo mngon par brjod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba/ yon tan tshad med pa las yang dag par byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs

pa'i spyod yul na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid ni mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ chos kyi 'khor lo ni shin du bskor/ slob ma shin du dul ba mtha' yas pa'i tshogs ni mnga'/ chos thams
cad la mnga' dbang ni brnyes/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa sgrub pa ni legs par mkhyen/ dbang po dam pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ni brnyes/ sems can thams cad kyi bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba legs

par 'joms pa la ni mkhas/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lhun kyis grub pa ni rgyun mi 'chad cing dge slong stong phrag drug bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang cang shes pa/

glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun du sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin du rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin du rnam
par grol ba/ nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad legs par bcom pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal po'i sras/ chos zab mo la gnas par mkhas pa/ dmigs pa med pa'i
chos kyis nges par byung ba/ spyod lam mdzes pa phun sum tshogs pa/ sbyin pa'i gnas chen por gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' la shin du zhugs pa sha stag go/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun
dpag tu med pa dang yang thabs gcig ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa chags pa med pa'i spyod yul gyis nges par byung ba/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i

chos kyi sprin las lhag mthong dang / rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i glog phyung zhing bdud rtsi'i chu'i rgyun gyi char 'bebs pas 'gro ba thams cad tshim par byed pa/ sems can thams cad la sems sa dang

mnyam pa rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba dang bral ba/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sna tshogs kyi lo thog yang dag par 'phel bar byed pa/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bas lhag pa'i shes rab kyi 'od zer rab tu gtong bas gti mug

gi mun pa sel ba'i lam gyi snang ba thob pa kun du ston pa dang / sems can gyi pad ma kha 'byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par byed pa dang / sred pa'i chu skems pa dang / shes pa'i las kyi mtha'

la rab tu 'jog pa la mngon par shes pa chen po dang / zhi gnas kyis rgyu ba/ zla ba lta bur 'gro ba thams cad la sems mnyam pas mngon par zhi bar bya ba'i bsam pa tshim par bya ba'i thabs la mkhas pas 'grib

pa dang 'phel ba kun du ston pa/ ri rab lta bu'i lhag pa'i bsam pas tshangs pa'i gnas pa'i rin po che shin du brtan te/ ngos bzhi nas yul gyi rlung thams cad kyis mi sgul cing 'jig rten gyi chos las mngon

par 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kun du bstan pa snang bar gyur pa/ rgya mtsho chen po ltar gzungs dang dran pa'i snod rgya chen po chos kyi chus yongs su gang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rin
po ches 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba/ ri dgas kyi rgyal po ltar bden pa'i rkang pa dang / byams pa rab tu 'phel ba'i mjug ma dang / zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi mig dang ldan zhing chos

zab mo la skrag pa med pas pha rol rgol ba thams cad 'joms pa/ bskal pa brgya stong phrag dpag tu med cing mtha' yas thug pa med par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgyun ma bcad pas yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa sha stag dang

thabs gcig pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun nas snang zhing sgrib pa med par lta ba zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhing thams cad kyi rgyun bkod pa kun du ston pa zhes

bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs las byung ba'i spyod pa'i blo gros shes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod lam thams cad kyis 'dul ba mi

'khrugs pa kun du ston pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa mtha' yas pa'i tog gi rgyal mtshan rnam par sprul pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

gser bzang po bsags pa'i 'od kyi gzi brjid kyi 'od zer zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyis rnam par nges pa'i tshig la spobs pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pas brtan pas bsags pa zhes bya ba dang / de la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa dag dang thabs gcig go/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba sgrib pa med pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas

lo bcu drug bzhes te/ tshangs par spyod pa rgyas par gyur par mkhyen/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa chen po de yang gzigs shing mkhyen te/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs

pa'i chos kyi mdzod 'dzin par mkhyen nas 'di snyam du gang gi phyir ngas byang chub sems dpa' rgya cher rjes su yongs su gzung ba dang / 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i

yul la gzud pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul chen pos byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba sgrib pa med pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs

yang dag par bstan par bya'o snyam du dgongs so/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi yul rnam par sprul pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so/ /

bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi yul rnam par sprul pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus steng gi bar snang la 'dod pa'i

khams dang / gzugs kyi khams kyi bar du 'khor kyi khyams/ sangs rgyas kyi gnas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas mngon par grub pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa yongs su sbyong ba/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi

khams snang bar byed pa/ sems can tshad med pa'i bsam pa tshim par byed pa/ lha'i gzhal med khang thams cad zil gyis gnon pa/ phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par skul ba/ gzhi bai dUr+ya dkar po'i

dbyings dang / 'dzam bu'i gling gi gser gyi khang pa dag dang / dpal gyi snying po'i rta babs dag dang / rin po che rdo'i snying po'i sgo khang dag dang / nor bu rin po che snying po'i kha khyer dag dang / rin po che dri ma med pa'i 'od

kyi stegs bu dag dang / rin po che kun nas 'od kyi khang pa brtsegs pa dag dang / rin po che thams cad kyis dgab pa dang / mu tig gi rgyan phreng rab tu spyangs pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sgreng ba dang /

lha'i dar gyi lda ldi mngon par spyangs pas bsngags pa bstan pa dpag tu med cing thug pa med pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad tsam zhig byung ste/ 'khor kyi khyams de yang tsan dan sbrul gyi snying pos bskus pa/

tsan dan dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i dri yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ dri'i mchog a ga ru dam pa'i snying pos bdugs pa/ klu'i mu tig dang rin po che'i me tog gis rnam par spras pa/ me tog sil ma bkram pa/ rin po che'i shing dang /

rin po che'i mkha' rten gyis mdzes par byas pa ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na rgyan mdzes pa bkod pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'khor gyi khyams de nyid na kun du snang ngo / /der gdan seng ge'i khri bye ba khrag

khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dpag tu med pa/ grangs med pa/ sna tshogs pa/ blta na sdug pa/ mtho ba/ rab tu bzang ba/ yangs pa/ rgya che ba/ yid du 'ong ba/ yid dga' bar byed pa dag byung bar gyur to/ /gling bzhi pa'i

'jig rten gyi khams 'dir them skas kha khyer mi bdun gyi 'phang tsam gyis bskor ba/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed kyis yongs su bzung ba/ rin po che an da rnyil dang / mthon kha chen pos snying por gyur pa/ brgya byin thogs

pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po'i gdugs can/ tshangs pa'i ne tso 'am ci dang / rin po che ser pos spras pa rin po che'i dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba kun du bskyod pas sgra 'byung ba/ sa'i steng nas 'khor gyi khyams la thug gi bar du

gyen du mngon par 'phags pa/ drang ba ma yo ba bzhi stong byung bar gyur to/ /gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ji lta ba bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi

khams thams cad du yang de lta bu'i them skas chen po dag byung bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs shing mkhyen bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs ma

thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ snang ba chen po yang byung bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang thabs gcig /nyan thos kyi

tshogs dang thabs gcig tu byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing nyan thos kyi tshogs kyis mdun du bdar te/ lha dang / klus mngon par bstod cing me tog gi char chen po ni 'bebs/ na bza'i char chen pos ni

mngon par 'gebs/ phye ma dang / spos dang / byug pa'i char chen po ni 'thor/ sil snyan dang / sgra dbyangs chen po ni rab tu sgrogs/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa ni rab tu g.yo bar mdzad/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs

med pa ni snang bar mdzad cing sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog tu gyur pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin kyi brlabs chen po dang /

sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las mi snang bar gyur te/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'

lding dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po bye ba phrag du ma zhabs 'bring du 'brang zhing nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi them skas kyi dbus nas 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa ga la ba der gshegs so/ /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa rgyal

chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das them skas su zhugs par rig nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lha'i me tog gi sprin kyi char rab tu phab ste thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/

nyi zla me dang nor bu'i 'od dang lha yul pa yi lha 'od shin du dri med pa/ /thub pas 'od kyis thams cad zil gyis mnan nas ngan song gsum po dag kyang zhi bar mdzad/ /ri bo lhun po dang ni kho ra khor yug rtse mo brnyil te zhing

rnams gsal bar gyur pas na/ /dga' zhing yid rnams mgu nas don rnams thams cad grub pa'i rgyal ba la ni skyabs su mchi/ /de nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis mngon par bstod

nas bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa'i zhabs 'bring du 'brang ngo / /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das them skas su zhugs par rig nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi

phyir lha'i spos kyi sprin gyi char rab tu phab ste/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ rdzu 'phrul dam pa brnyes shing rab tu mtshungs pa med pa rnam par 'phrul pa shin du ston/ /rgyal ba nyi ma ji bzhin 'phags te

zhing rnams bye ba brgya dag tu yang rab tu gda'/ /rgyal bas rang gi yon tan kun kyis zhing rnams thams cad brgyan te shin du mdzes mdzad pa/ /gang zhig shin du mnyam med mtshungs pa med cing rdzu 'phrul dbang du gyur la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

de nas sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 'bring du 'brang ngo / /de nas lha'i rgyal po rab 'thab bral la sogs pa 'thab bral gyi lha

rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das them skas su zhugs par rig nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lha'i na bza'i sprin gyi char rab tu phab ste thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ bde gshegs
khyod kyi mkhyen pa mtha' yas yangs pas sems can bsam pa mkhyen/ /mkha' 'dra'i lam gyi chos gsum dag la chags med thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/ /sems kyi 'jug pa gcig gis 'gro ba'i sems kyi spyod pa

thams cad mkhyen/ /des na srid pa gsum po dag na lus can rnams kyis mchod par 'os/ /de nas 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi

zhabs 'bring du 'brang bar gyur to/ /de nas lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan la sogs pa dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das them skas su zhugs par rig nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lha'i rin po

che'i sprin gyi char rab tu phab ste thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ gang gi slad du sgra dang yi ge ma mchis gang du'ang rgyu ba ma mchis pas/ /khyod kyis chos rnams mi g.yo ya ma brla dang sgyu ma smig rgyu

'drar mkhyen nas/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rjes sems can rnams la ched du chos mchog gsungs pas na/ /chos kyi dngos po'i rang bzhin mkhas pa bdag med gsung ba'i rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas dga'

ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 'bring du 'brang ngo / /de nas lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul la sogs pa 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyis

bcom ldan 'das them skas su zhugs par rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lha rgyan gyi sprin gyi char rab tu phab ste/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis mngon par bstod do/

chos kyi zong gis rang gi stobs bcu mkha' 'dra 'od zer ldan pa dang / /thugs rje brnyes nas byams pa'i dgongs pas sems can rnams la gzugs ston pa/ /gru tshul chos la gnyis su med par zhugs kyang rgyal ba

mtshungs par mkhyen/ /chos kyi khyad par sems lhag don kun grub pa'i rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das

kyi zhabs 'bring du 'brang bar gyur to/ /de nas lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur la sogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das them skasu zhugs pa dang 'khor gyi khyams su mngon par phyogs par rig nas

bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir mu tig gi do shal gyi sprin gyi char rab tu phab ste/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /tshul khrims dri ma mi mnga' rnam

dag rnam par nges pa dam pa ting nge 'dzin mchog mi g.yos pa/ /mnyam med blo ldan rgya mtsho 'dra bar gnas shing srid las rnam grol dbang sgyur zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rim gyis byams dang ldan pa'i thugs rje yis ni

bden pa'i lam gyi rnam pa rab tu gnas mdzad pa/ /rnam thar gsum gyi lam gyi khyim na gnas pa'i bde gshegs seng ge khyod la bdag cag phyag 'tshal lo/ /snying rje'i chu bo ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam 'phel ba/ /zhi gnas

mdab ma rnam par grol ba'i me tog rgyas/ /slob ma'i tshogs kyi bung bas nges par bsnyen gyur pa/ /bde gshegs pad ma la ni spyi bos phyag 'tshal lo/ /mnga' bdag g.yo ba ma mchis tshul khrims sar gnas pas/ /

brtson 'grus mtshungs pa ma mchis stobs kyis yang dag 'phags yul gyi rlung rnams langs pa chen pos mi g.yos pa/ /sangs rgyas ri bo dam pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mnga' bdag thugs rjes dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor
rnam dag pa/ /blo gter blo mchog gis ni rab tu 'joms mdzad pa/ /sems can brgya dag gis ni mang pos mchod gyur pa/ /bde gshegs zla ba khyod la bdag cag phyag 'tshal lo/ /mkha' ltar zhi ba'i rnam par

thar pa'i lam gshegs pa/ /shes rab 'od kyis phyogs bcu dag ni rgyas 'gengs shing / /skye bo mang po mtshungs med pad ma kha 'byed pa/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma dam pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mnga' bdag phyogs
bcu'i 'jig rten gsum po dag na yang / /'dren pa khyod dang mnyam pa dmigs par ma gyur te/ /khyod ni yon tan kun gyis yang dag grub pa lags/ /bdag cag khyod la bstod pas ngoms par 'gyur ma lags/ /

lha dbang klu dang lha ma yin gyis phyag bgyis pa/ /lha mchog brgya dag gis kyang yang dag mngon bstod pa/ /bsngags pa brgya phrag mang pos yang dag mngon bstod pa/ /bde bar gshegs pa bstod 'os khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

de nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 'bring du 'brang ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das de ltar sangs rgyas kyi yul rnam par

sprul pa tshad med pa lha 'bum gyis mngon par bstod nas 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par gshegs te/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir them skas nas 'khor gyi khyams rin po che

bkod par gshegs pa shes pa de bzhin du/ stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang gshegs par shes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor gyi khyams

stong gsum gyis yongs su gzung ba rin po che bkod par gdan seng ge'i khri ji ltar bshams pa la bzhugs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos chen po dag kyang stan ci rigs pa la 'khod par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan

'das de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par thar pa sgrib pa med pa la sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par thar pa sgrib pa med pa la sangs

rgyas rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i spu'i khung bu thams cad kyi spu'i khung bu re re nas kyang 'od zer gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed byung ste/ byung nas kyang shar phyogs

kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas so/ /de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang gi phyogs rnams dang / 'og dang / steng dang / phyogs mtshams rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas so/ /

'jig rten gyi khams rnams snang bar byas ma thag tu/ de nas sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba rgyun chad do/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams

dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba yang rgyun chad do/ /sems can thams cad kyang skad cig de la 'dod chags kyis gnod par ma gyur cing / zhe sdang gis ma yin gti mug gis
ma yin te/ nyon mongs pa gzhan gyis kyang gnod par ma gyur to/ /de'i tshe sems can thams cad kyang byams pa'i sems dang / pha ma lta bu'i 'du shes su gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par

bskul ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od de las tshigs su bcad pa 'di byung ngo / /gang gis brtson 'grus stobs ni mtha' yas yangs pa brtan pa brtsams gyur te/ /gang gis brtson 'grus

chen po'i stobs kyis bskal pa dag las phyir phyogs spangs gang gis yon tan dag ni phyogs bcu rnams na mthu ldan rab brjod pa/ /shAkya thub pa'i 'od yangs 'gro ba thams cad snang bar byed pa mdzes/ /gang chos rgya chen bla

med mnyan slad de yi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ /mkhas pa blo gros brtan pa dag ni bskal pa grangs med rtag tu nyan/ /blo rgyas gang zhig rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa tshim skyed pa/ /thub pa des ni gang phyir sems

can bde bar bzhed pas 'od 'di phyung / /mnga' bdag gang zhig brtson 'grus kyis ni bdud stobs mu stegs tshogs bcas pham mdzad nas/ /pad ma byung ba bzhin du 'phags shing phyogs bcu dag tu lhun po ji bzhin mdzes/ /

gang zhig nyi ma bzhin du sku yi 'od kyis 'gro ba ma lus snang mdzad pa/ /de yi chos kyi 'khor lo gzhag pa don chen gsan du rgyal ba gshegs su gsol/ /rab tu bskor bar ma gyur mtshungs pa med cing rgyal ba kun gyis

bskor gyur pa/ /'khor lo dam pa stobs bcu sems can thugs brtse phyir ni de ring skor bar mdzad/ /srog chags rnams kyis bsten par rnyed dka' legs pa rgya chen de ring 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gang dag dad pa dang

ba che yangs don du gnyer ba de dag de ring ltos/ /de nas 'od zer de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis go bar byas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par bskul/ 'jig rten gyi
khams thams cad rab tu g.yo bar byas/ sems can thams cad bde bar byas/ nyon mongs pa'i khams thams cad rnam par sbyangs/ mun pa mun nag thams cad bsal/ bdud kyi khyim thams cad mog mog por byas

nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa dag dang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du slar 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas shar phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa dri med rnam

dag rin chen 'od byang chub kyi yan lag dang ldan pa'i chos rgyun mi 'chad pa'i 'od zer bkod pa'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan mtha' yas pa'i rin po che'i bsod nams bkod pas rgya che ba dang ldan pa na/

byang chub sems dpa' me rtog dpal gyi snying po chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing / mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig tu sangs

rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi

zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan khri bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lha'i nor bu bai dUr+ya'i dra ba'i char rab tu phab ste/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par

bstod do/ /bcom ldan rab tu mtshungs med yon tan pha rol phyin/ /khyod kyi yon tan bsngags phreng phyogs bcu kun na brjod/ /khyod kyi yon tan tshogs mchis zhing gang yon tan gter/ /der ni chos don gnyer ba bdag cag rab tu mchi/

chos dbyings mnyam nyid rnam rtog ma mchis ji bzhin du/ /bcom ldan dri med 'od kyis mnyam pa nyid mkhyen kyang / /shin du bslabs pa'i sgyu ma mkhan ltar chos kyi rgyal/ /sems can rnam par dgrol slad tha dad bstan pa mdzad/ /de nas

byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ shar phyogs logs su gnas te/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la

'khod do/ /de nas lho phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas rin chen spobs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' rin chen srog shing zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma

thag tu byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed

'dir phyin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan khri bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las

byed cing gser gyi dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do/ /bcom ldan thugs rje'i sprin gyis 'jig rten rgyas bkang nas/ /'od kyi glog

phyung stong pa bdag med sgra bsgrags te/ /yan lag brgyad pa'i lam gyi chu yis zhi mdzad cing / /dkar po'i stobs dbang nags tshal gel pa 'phel bar mdzad/ /bde gshegs shes rab 'od kyis gti mug mun bsal

nas/ /ring nas srid mtshor gnyid log sems can sad mdzad de/ /lam yang bstan cing sred pa dag kyang skams par mdzad/ /thar pa'i grong gnas rnams kyi mig kyang rnam par sbyong / de nas byang chub sems dpa'

de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas lho phyogs logs su gnas te/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do/ /de nas

nub phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba dang ldan pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sgra bsgrags pa'i stobs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu byang chub sems

dpa' gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/

'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod

pa'i las byed cing nor bu mu tig gi do shal gyi phreng ba'i dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do/ /khyod kyi sku yi phrin las nam

mkha'i khams 'dra zhing / /smon lam dge bas dag pa bye ba phrag mang ldan/ /dri med rnam par dag cing zag pa med pa des/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing rnams bsam gyis mi khyab gsal/ /khyod kyi tshig ni rgyun

chags gsal zhing mtshungs pa ste/ /'gro ba bsam dag bsam pa mnyam nyid yongs tshim bgyid/ /sems kyi rgyu dang rnam rtog gang yang mi mnga' yang / /sems can bsam pa rnams la rgyal ba dag gi 'byung / /de nas byang chub

sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas nub phyogs logs su gnas te/ rang gi rdzu phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do/ /de nas

byang phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas rin chen spobs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa na byang chub sems dpa' blo mchog rgya mtsho zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu byang chub

sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/ 'khor gyi

khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing nor

bu'i do shal dang rin po che'i dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do/ /'dzam bu'i chu gser btso ma lta bur ser ba'i sku/ /kun nas spyan

mnga' phyogs bcu dag tu rnam par mdzes/ /mtshungs med sku la sems can gang dag nges rtog pa/ /de dag skyon med bde zhing dga' ba thob par 'gyur/ /gang gis lhun po brtsegs pa lta bu'i khrun tsam du/ /'jig rten

mkhyen pa mtshungs med rgyal ba bltas kyang ni/ /de yi rdzu 'phrul kun gyi stobs dang brtson 'grus kyi/ /rnam par sprul pas rgyal ba'i spyi gtsug mthong mi nus/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i

bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas byang phyogs logs su gnas te rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do/ /de nas shar dang lho'i mtshams phyogs na de bzhin

gshegs pa mya ngan thams cad bcom pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' kun nas snang ba zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bcu'i

bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par

bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing rin po che'i dra bas bcom

ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do/ /spu yis mtha' dbung ma mchis pa yi zhing 'dzin kyang / /sems can rnams la mi gnod zhing la mi gnod

pas/ /mig med rnams kyis rgyal ba'i spyod yul 'tshal bar dka'/ /sangs rgyas sras ni rgyal ba'i byin gyis yang dag 'tshal/ /zhing gcig phyogs la zhing mang rab 'byam ston mdzad de/ /kun tu bstan kyang rnam par

'phel dang 'grib ma mchis/ /bsam pa chen po dag ldan ci 'drar gyur de la/ /dpag med rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul pas de ston to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom

ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas shar dang lho'i phyogs mtshams logs su gnas te/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do/ /de nas lho dang nub kyi mtshams phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa

thugs rje chen pos sems can thams cad la gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mig bzang po na/ byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po sems pa zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' gang

gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che

bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing na bza'i dra bas
bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do/ /sems can dam pa g.yag rnga thogs pa ji bzhin du/ /tshul khrims dri med nor bu rin

chen 'dra ba srung / /tshul khrims med gzigs mgon po shin du thugs rje zhing / /bdag la bstod pa mi mdzad gzhan la smod mi mdzad/ /lhun po ji bzhin khyod brtan bla ma rgya chen sten/ /chu gter zab mo bzhin du shin du
gting dpag dka'/ /srid pa thog mar bcings pa kun nas grol ba ste/ /sems can khrag khrig nyes pa chen pos bcings las grol/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad

med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas lho dang nub kyi mtshams phyogs logs su gnas te/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do/ /de nas nub dang byang gi

mtshams phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od bkod pa'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mun pa dang bral ba na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer dra ba can zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu byang chub

sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/
'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la

mchod pa'i las byed cing rgyan gyi dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do/ /srid pa'i rang bzhin sgyu ma'i rang bzhin rtogs mdzad nas/ /

byed pa sgyu ma lta bu dngos po med par ston/ /sgyu ma lta bu sems can khams ni 'dul mdzad kyang / /'di na sems can rang bzhin ma mchis khams ma mchis/ /dper na mi zhig gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam na/ /gzugs

mthong yang dag 'du shes de bzhin mthong ma lags/ /'dus byas dngos po ma mchis rmi lam 'dra bar gsung / /chos rnams snang yang 'di na chos la chags ma mchis/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub

sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ nub dang byang gi mtshams phyogs logs su gnas te/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do/ /de nas

byang dang shar gyi mtshams phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i dkyil dri ma med pa rnam par sems pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams yongs dag dri ma med par rab tu gnas pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' blo

mtha' yas dri med ces bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ skad cig thang

cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom

ldan 'das la lan khri bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing rtag tu sgra 'byung ba'i sil snyan gyi dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la

mngon par bstod do/ /zab mo'i chos la mkhas shing rab tu zhi la mos/ /khyod kyis chos kun stong zhing mtshan ma med par mkhyen/ /khyod kyi thugs kyi dgongs pa 'jig rten kun ma 'tshal/ /mtha' yas blo mnga'
sems kyi bsam pa cho ga mkhyen/ /sems can gcig gi spyod bzhin sems can kun gyi spyod/ /gang dag dus gsum ldan pa de dag khyod kyis mkhyen/ /sems can 'du shes mi 'jug sems kyi 'du shes mun/ /'du shes

yongs shes mkhas shing mnyam pa nyid dang ldan/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams

logs su gnas te/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do/ /de nas 'og gi phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen ud pa la dmar po'i dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams

rnam par snang byed du snang ba na/ byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa'i rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig

tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas des bcom ldan

'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing nor bu rin po che'i gling gi phreng gi dra bas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste/

tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do/ /gal te khrag khrig zhing na ji snyed rdul mchis pa/ /de snyed bde gshegs sras po rgyal ba'i drung lhags te/ /bskal pa bye ba stong mang zhu ba zhus
pa dag /de dag thams cad tshig gcig dus kyis go bar mdzad/ /blo la mkhas pa rab rdzogs shes rab shin tu rdzogs/ /gzungs dang ting 'dzin rab rdzogs bsod nams mtha' yas te/ /bskal pa mang po mtha' yas

bsngags pa rab brjod kyang / /skra rtses rgya mtsho ji bzhin zad par mi nus so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas 'og gi

phyogs logs su gnas te/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do/ /de nas steng gi phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa sgra bsgrags mchog gi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams

rgyan gyis brgyan pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'od des bskul ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/

lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas des bcom ldan 'das

kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan khri bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed cing rgyan thams cad bkod pa dang / rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas bcom ldan 'das
la mngon par bkab ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do/ /bde gshegs sku yi 'phrin las mtha' dang dbung ma mchis/ /bla med rnams kyi gsung thugs spyod yul

mtha' yas pa/ /de ni sangs rgyas mkhyen gyi sems can gzhan gyis min/ /dper na nam mkha'i mtha' ma skye bos mi rnyed bzhin/ /mtshungs med spyod pa mtha' dbung med pa ji bzhin du/ /byang chub 'khor lo de bzhin

'on te mya ngan 'das/ /sa bon ji bzhin de ltar 'bras bu 'byung ba ltar/ /de bzhin phyogs bcur rgyal ba'i gnas kyang tshad ma mchis/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa tshad

med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas steng gi bar snang la dong ste/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sprul pa'i rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do/ /de ltar phyogs bcu dag nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu 'dus pa la

sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa dag 'od des bskul ma thag tu skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do/ /

de nas bcom ldan 'das dran pa dang ldan zhing mkhyen bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ gsung gsal ba'i sgra mdzad nas/ gsung bsal ba'i sgra des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis

go bar gyur te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gang dag dad pa dang ldan zhing snod du gyur pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag gis

bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung bsal ba'i sgra de thos nas lus dang / sems tshim par gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus ji ltar byung ba'i them skas dag nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod

par phyin te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu ji ltar 'thun pa'i stan dag la 'khod do/ /gsung bsal ba'i sgra de nyid kyis tshangs pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs ris dang /

tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang / tshangs 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / 'od chen dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod nams skyes dang /

'bras bu che ba dang / 'du shes med pa'i sems can dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / gya nom snang dang / shin du mthong dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyang bskul nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'khor gyi khyams rin po che bkod

par phyin te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas stan rab tu brtan pa dag la 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dus pa chen po de mkhyen nas smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas byang chub

sems dpa'i stobs nye bar ston pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer phyung ste/ des thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de nyid kyi spyi bor mi snang bar gyur to/ /

de nas byang chub sems dpa' me tog dpal gyi snying po chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba 'od des reg ma thag tu/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgyan thams cad bkod pa zhes bya ba la snyoms

par zhugs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' me tog dpal gyi snying po chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgyan thams cad bkod pa la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe 'khor

gyi khyams rin po che bkod pa'i dbus nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan seng ge'i khri 'phang du shing ta la bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad bcu tsam du mtho ba/ rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa/ kha khyer rgyan thams cad
las byas pa/ ras bkod pa thams cad bting ba/ me tog sil ma sna tshogs thams cad bkram pa/ bla re yid du 'ong ba thams cad bres pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus thams cad kyis yang dag par bzung ba/

'khor thams cad kyi mig gis bltas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa/ bsam pa tshim par byed pa zhig byung bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' me tog dpal gyi snying po chos

thams cad la dbang sgyur bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan seng ge'i khri chen po bskul bar bsngags pa mtha' yas shes bya ba mngon par sprul nas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ gus pa dang

bcas shing zhe sa dang bcas par thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ nyi ma'i 'od kyis 'gro ba'i dgos pa rab tu bgyid/ /lha dbang gzi brjid yon tan sum bcu rtsa gsum dga'/ /tshangs

pa'i dbyangs kyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten rnam par mdzes/ /sangs rgyas mthu yi yul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa 'di/ /chos rnams mi g.yo nam mkha'i rang bzhin ya ma rla/ /sgyu ma smig rgyu lta bu chu yi zla 'dra zhing / /rje med

byed pa po dang tshor ba po med par/ /mkhyen nas mgon po 'dir ni rnam par sgrub pa ston/ /bkod pa'i sems kyi dbang 'gro sems ni gzugs can min/ /rnam sgrub thams cad sems kyi rang bzhin dbang du 'gro/ /bkod pa

thams cad 'dir ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin 'dra/ /rnam sgrub bdag gis ma mchis gang na 'ang gnas ma mchis/ /gang gis sems rgyun ma mchis rang bzhin dag 'tshal ba/ /de la glo bur gnas pa'i nyon mongs ma mchis so/ /rtog dang

kun rtog yongs su rtog las sems grol ba/ /de ni sgyu ma'i rnam par sprul pa sna tshogs ston/ /sa steng rdul tsam mngon par 'phags pa ma mchis kyang / /sa steng nor bu rin chen sna tshogs kun du bstan/ /gdan gang bzhugs

nas sems can bye ba 'dul 'gyur ba/ /khyod kyi seng ge'i khri gdan rab mdzes bdag gis bgyis/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan mchog dang dar gyi phreng ba bsgreng / /de ni gang du 'ang 'gro ba ma mchis 'ong ma mchis/ /khyod kyis

gang nas chos rnams 'du ba mkhyen nas kyang / /sems can dam pa rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs ston/ /tshangs pa'i dbyangs ldan legs shing shin du bsrungs pa'i gsung / /'jig rten sgron ma mdzad pa bsod nams gzi brjid mang / /

bdag la thugs brtse'i slad du 'dzegs te gdan la bzhugs/ /rga dang 'chi dang na ba gcod pa'i chos bshad gsol/ /khyod la bsnyen bkur bgyi dang chos ni mnyan slad du/ /rnam dag sems can 'di rnams phyogs bcu dag nas lhags/ /

gang gi don du lhags pa'i don de stsal du gsol/ /seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te chos kyang bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' me tog dpal gyi snying po chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i lhag pa'i

bsam pa mkhyen nas gdan seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa brnyes nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba sgrib pa med pa'i sgo zhes bya

ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs byang chub sems dpa'i lam bkod pa la dmig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa yongs su sgrub pa dang / ye shes kyi 'byung gnas chos thams cad

la dbang sgyur ba'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug pa/ so so yang dag par rig pa la rnam par gtan la dbab pa la gzhol ba'i sgor 'jug pa/ mngon par shes pa chen po'i ye shes la gzhol ba'i sgor 'jug pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i

'khor la mi skye ba'i chos ston pa theg pa thams cad theg pa gcig tu mnyam pa nyid du yang dag par 'du ba/ chos kyi dbyings tshul gcig cing ma 'dres pa la 'jug pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang dbang po la 'jug pa ston

pa snying po dang ldan pa chos rnam par gdon mi za ba/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jom par byed pa/ tshul bzhin gyi chos kyi tshul la gzhol bar 'jug pa/ nyon mongs pa dang lta bar gyur pa thams cad 'dul ba/

chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'jug pa/ thub pa med par yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa'i thabs dang ye shes ston pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la 'jug pa/ chags pa med pa'i byin gyi brlabs

kyi sgor 'jug pa/ chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par nges pa ston pa/ rtog pa med pa dang rnam par rtog pa med pa mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pa/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad bsags pa'i phyir

rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo mnyam pa nyid rtogs par byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs mnyam pa nyid kyi rgyan dang ldan pa dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / mos pa dang / shes rab zad

mi shes pa mngon par sgrub pa/ nyan thos kyi theg pas 'dul ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa'i tshul la 'jug pa/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas 'dul ba'i phyir lus dang / ngag dang sems rab tu dben par shes pa/ theg pa

chen pos 'dul ba'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sar dbang bskur ba rab tu thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan thams cad brjod pa'i phyir chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i tshul la 'jug pa 'di lta bu'i chos kyi

rnam grangs yang dag par rab tu bstan pa dang / bsnyad pa dang / bshad pa dang bklag pa dang / gzung ba dang / rnam par shes par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su bskang ba dang / de bzhin

gshegs pa'i rnam par sprul pa yang dag par bstan pa dang / 'khor gyi the tsom thams cad bcad pa dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad tshar bcad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'bar bar bya ba dang / sangs

rgyas kyi mdzad pa chen po yongs su thob par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das gdan seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs so// // bam po gnyis pa/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' rin chen srog shing zhes bya bas

sangs rgyas kyi rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor sangs rgyas kyi rgyan kyis brgyan par byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa'

sgra bsgrags stobs kyi rgyal pos pad ma bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs nas/ thams cad dang / ldan pa'i 'khor gyi lag pa rnams su me tog gi lda ldi dag dang / me tog gi skon bu rnams byin gyis

brlabs te/ me tog gi lda ldi dang / me tog gi skon bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad la mngon par 'thor ro/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa'i blo mchog

rgya mtshos dri bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi spu'i khung bu thams cad du tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i dri byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub

sems dpa' 'od zer dra ba can gyis 'od bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la lus kyi 'od mtha' yas par byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub

sems dpa' snying rje chen po sems pas mig mi 'dzums pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par phyogs shing mig mi 'dzums par

byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' blo mtha' yas dri med kyis chos la mchog tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor

chos don du gnyer zhing chos la dga' ba dang mos par byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa'i rgyan bkod pas rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor sgrib pa lnga rnam par sel bar byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal pos brjed pa med

par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor byang chub kyi sems dran zhing de bzhin gshegs pa la dmigs pa mi brjed par byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas de'i tshe

sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun nas snang ba zhes bya bas zil gyis mi non pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor bdud dang / phyir rgol

ba bcom par byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' bdud rab tu 'joms pas bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i bdud rab tu 'joms pas bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten

gyi khams na bdud bye ba phrag brgya ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dpung dang bcas/ g.yog 'khor dang bcas te myur ba myur bar rings thabs su rang rang gi bdud kyi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur te/ 'khor gyi khyams rin po che

bkod par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lha'i mchod pa rnam pa brgya stong phrag du mas bcom ldan 'das la mchod nas gus pa dang bcas shing
zhe sa dang bcas par thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab nas bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gsol ba 'tshal na bcom ldan 'das chos bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa chos bshad du gsol/

byang chub sems dpa' bdud rab tu 'joms pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis bdag cag bdud kyi sug las 'dor zhing slan chad sems can rnams la mig gis mi rtsol bar 'gyur ba'i las mi bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag

la dbugs dbyung ba stsol cig dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du mchis te/ bdag cag chos nyan par bgyid do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud de dag dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /grogs po dag

legs so legs so/ /gang gi phyir khyed bdud kyi las kyang 'or la de bzhin gshegs pa la chos bshad par gsol ba yang thob shig dang / de nyid khyed kyi bdud kyi lam thams cad las 'da' ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/

sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i phyir ro/ /grogs po dag 'di lta ste/ dper na mun pa mun nag lo du mar bsags pa ni mar me gcig gis med par 'gyur ro/ /grogs po dag de bzhin du nyon

mongs pa'i mun pa mun nag bskal pa brgyar bsags pa yang ye shes kyi stobs bskyed pa gcig gis med par 'gyur ro/ /grogs po dag 'di lta ste/ dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gcig dang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gcig dang /

nor bu rin po che chen po gcig gis mun pa mun nag thams cad sel to grogs po dag de bzhin du dge ba'i sems lhag mthong dang ldan pa gcig gis mi shes pa'i mun pa mun nag thams cad sel to/ /grogs po dag de'i phyir khyed dge ba'i rtsa ba

'dis rim gyis mi shes pa'i mun pa mun nag thams cad bsal nas chos kyi snang ba chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des bcom ldan

'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi yul de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa dang / kun du bstan pa 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /deng ni de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i

spyod pa la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba sgrib pa med pa'i sgo zhes bgyi ba 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bzhed par the tsom ma mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das e ma byang chub sems dpa'

rnams kyi 'dus pa 'di ni che ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes chen pos rnam par rol pa/ phyogs bcur sgra bsgrags pa sems shin du byang bar

bgyis te dri ma ma mchis par rig pa dang / rnam par grol bas snang bar gyur pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags pa/ chos thams cad la dbang phyug gis dbang sgyur ba/ pha rol du phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol du

son pa thabs la mkhas pa thams cad las nges par skyes pa/ bdud kyi las dang / rtsod pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad bsal ba/ phas kyi rgol ba dang / ngan pa'i tshogs can gyi tshogs thams cad rab tu 'dul ba tshig thams

cad rab tu dbye ba bstan pa shes pa la mkhas pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa chags pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol du son pa/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / khrel yod pa dang / mos pa dang / gzungs dang / ye shes

rab tu thob pa byin gyi brlabs thogs pa ma mchis shing spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma lags pa shes pa la mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi mos pa ji lta ba

bzhin du chos ston pa/ 'khrul pa ma mchis par kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa'i chos ston pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sgra dang / skad la mkhas pa/ mi 'am ci dang bya ka la ping ka dang / khrung khrung gi sgra dang / tshangs pa'i sgra

dbyangs can/ shin du bshes gnyen bgyis pas sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la 'god pa byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa can/ brtan zhing shin du gnas la mi g.yo zhing

ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bgyid pa/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan yang dag par bsgreng bar bgyid pa/ rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi shigs pa'i khor yug lta bu smon pa ma mchis pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo

blta dka' zhing rtogs par dka' ba la zhugs pa/ chad pa dang / rtag pa'i mtha' gnyi ga dang / lta bar gyur pa thams cad dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par bcad pa tshogs can chen po'i tshogs kyi rgyal po yongs su 'gugs

pa/ ded dpon chen po bskal pa grangs med par chos dkon mchog gis bsod nams yang dag par bsgrubs pa/ sman pa'i rgyal po chen po sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa gzugs can ma lags pa'i nad gso bar bgyid pa/ seng ge'i

sgra chen po sgrog pa/ snrel zhi'i rgyud dang / spyi'u tshugs kyi rgyud thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba la mi skrag pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos lus legs par brgyan pa/ gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin bgyid pa/

thams cad la sems dpa'/ bdud bzhi dang / nyon mongs pa'i g.yul 'dul ba/ mnyan pa lta bur gyur pa/ dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par 'jug pa/ shin du yongs su sbyang ba bgyis pa/ sems can thams cad rab tu sgrol ba la brtson pa/ ri lta bur gyur pa/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad po rnyed pa dang / ma rnyed pa dang / grags pa dang / ma grags pa dang / smad pa dang /

bstod pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal las log pa/ dga' ba dang / dang ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba'i chos la sems zhugs pa/ chos dkon mchog gi 'od zer dang ldan pa/ shes rab kyis ngoms nas ngoms par bgyid pa/ pad ma

lta bu 'dus byas kyi chos thams cad kyis mi gos pa/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/ zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa'i 'od mog mog por bgyid pa/ rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ chos dkon

mchog thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi gcod pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang / 'dul ba'i cho ga 'tshal ba/ sangs rgyas kyi chos dkon mchog thams cad kyi mdzod

yang dag par 'dzin pa bsngags pa mtha' yas pa dang yang dag par ldan pa bsod nams tshad ma mchis pa bsags pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la nye bar gyur pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i

mu'i bskal par bsngags pa mthar mi phyin pa 'di lta bu rnams kyi 'dus pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de la bdag 'di snyam du bcom ldan 'das ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas nges par 'byung ba sgrib pa med

pa'i sgo zhes bgyi ba 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bzhed pa snyam bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni phan 'dogs par 'gyur ba/ sems can thams cad tshim par

'gyur ba/ ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par skyed pa/ sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su sbyong ba/ spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub

sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul gcig la 'jug pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos la dbang bskur ba/ skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyu dang 'bras

bu chud mi za ba/ nges pa'i sems can rnams la rkyen nye bar sgrub pa/ ma nges pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po nye bar sgrub pa/ log pa nyid du nges pa'i sems can rnams 'dzud pa/ theg pa gsum

la mos pa'i sems can rnams la rnam par dgod pa ston pa ste ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rgyan lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/

bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas byung bar gyur na ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'di lta bu 'di dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa 'di dag gis 'khor gyi khyams 'dir sems bskyed pa gcig gis

bkod pa gang byin gyis brlabs pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bskal pa brgya phrag stong du yang ston pa'i rngo mi thog go/ /bcom ldan 'das de la bdag 'di snyam bgyid de/ e ma ji tsam du gang rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam

par sprul pa'i cho 'phrul 'di lta bu 'di mthong yang nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la re ba skyed pa'i sems can shes rab 'chal pa can de dag ni ngo mtshar che ba snyam bgyid do/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das

byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa nyid kyis nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis non pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can gyi mi la la zhig nor bu rin

po che bai dUr+ya bor nas nor bu mching bu la dmigs pa snyam du sems pa dang / bcom ldan 'das gang dag theg pa chen po bor nas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la dmigs par bgyi ba snyam du sems pa'i sems can dag ni

'dra ba nyid du bdag la gda'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / skyed par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad ni

ring por mi thogs par chos 'di lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'khor de las srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
